issue.title: www.techbloat.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.techbloat.com/how-to-find-ease-of-access-windows-11.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.techbloat.com%2Fhow-to-find-ease-of-access-windows-11.html) ### Comment > Using MS Edge or Firefox, search the term (without quotes) "windows where is ease of access font" > Site in question was listed in CoPilot results as well as 1/3 down the page. The page was loaded with ads. > I opened the Filtering Log and refreshed (Ctrl/Refresh). 11 rules were applied but the site is mess. > ``` Username: @B777-200ER ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/mizzsuwpjc0gssw44wkk8wg0co4g40whna6qhguh34.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/jhy4nc2bmjkk0s0coss04cw8wsc0osgml8hrue6ye8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/syk5sveuaj4ccg4s8sg00wck84cs488ecsx03q9sig.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26200.0` Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (7200),
Disable cache for third-party requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://d.adguard-dns.com/dns-query/xxxxxxx`
filters: `1.59`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)`,
`None` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.bing.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2F) Other extensions used: | `Extensions: 1Password, AdGuard Brower Asst; Evernote Web Clipper, Feedbro, Microsoft Power Automate, Fireshot` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26200.0&browser=edge&filters=2.3.4.10.17.18.19.20.21.22&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29%252CNone&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fd.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query%2Fxxxxxxx&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fassistant%252F4.3%252Fassistant.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=1.59%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=false&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=7200&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=false&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=false&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.bing.com%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
